bill.title: Establishing a minimum pay rate for adjunct faculty of the university system of New Hampshire and community college system of New Hampshire.
bill.description: Establishing a minimum pay rate for adjunct faculty of the university system of New Hampshire and community college system of New Hampshire.

history.action: Introduced (in recess of) 01/06/2021 and referred to Labor, Industrial and Rehabilitative Services House Journal  2 P. 51

bill.full_text: new subdivision adjunct faculty salary amend rsa by inserting after section the following new subdivision adjunct faculty salary adjunct faculty salary adjunct faculty employed at any institution within the university system shall be paid not less than percent of the salary received by faculty as calculated on a per credit hour basis new subdivision adjunct faculty salary amend rsa by inserting after section the following new subdivision adjunct faculty salary adjunct faculty salary adjunct faculty employed at any institution within the community college system shall be paid not less than percent of the salary received by faculty as calculated on a per credit hour basis
